data.message:
I was blocked of sharing when i posted 3 pictures of a business  - it shows what website it is and where, NO SPAM and all norms. PLEASE DETAIL WHY  because ive seen to others that only says read this,,,, and no I want to know exactly why it was so I wont do it again, 

Thank you

replies.message: Hi Daily. It's possible that your account was blocked due to member feedback our team received, or for overusing a feature. Keep in mind that blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days and that we can't lift this block for any reason. For more information, visit: http://bit.ly/2m666mF. -Kiara
Facebook So you mean if I share something to many times? how may am I aloud to share the same post? if it is a business page?
